issue.title: [Rust] Activate generate_decimal256_case arrow integration test for rust
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17176](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17176). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
arrow-rs has added decimal256 support recently. We should activate generate_decimal256_case integration test.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17176?focusedCommentId=17573921) by L. C. Hsieh (viirya):*
The PR was merged, but this ticket is not automatically closed. cc `[~alamb]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17176?focusedCommentId=17573933) by L. C. Hsieh (viirya):*
I closed it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17176?focusedCommentId=17579777) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Thanks `[~viirya]`  – I only check the Apache Jira updates occasionally. Sorry I didn't see it before now

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17176?focusedCommentId=17579791) by L. C. Hsieh (viirya):*
No problem. Was just wondering if it should be closed automatically. Thanks.
